properties.areaDesc: Waters from Savannah GA to Altamaha Sound GA extending from 20 nm to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 29 at 3:41AM EST until January 31 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 25 knots with gusts up to 30 knots
and seas 5 to 8 feet expected.

* WHERE...Savannah to Altamaha Sound from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...From 1 AM Thursday to 9 AM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM THURSDAY TO 9 AM EST FRIDAY
